me.lihq.game.models

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lihq.game.models.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    The map is a collection of Rooms , it links them all together.

      This function initialises all the rooms of the Ron Cooke Hub and their transitions

      This method sets one of the rooms randomly to the murder room
